headline: Invesco Canada announces changes to risk ratings on Canadian-listed ETFs

headline: Ameriprise Stock Gains on Q4 Earnings Beat as Revenues & AUM Grow Y/Y
summary: AMP shares jump in pre-market trading after Q4 earnings beat estimates, with adjusted EPS up 16% y/y as revenues, and record AUM and AUA climb.

headline: SEI Investments Beats on Q4 Earnings as Revenues & AUM Grow Y/Y
summary: SEIC beats Q4 earnings estimates as revenues climb 9% and AUM jumps 16% y/y, offsetting higher expenses tied to the Stratos deal.

headline: Invesco (IVZ) Upgraded to Strong Buy: Here's What You Should Know
summary: Invesco (IVZ) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).

headline: Invesco price target lowered to $33 from $35 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital analyst Kenneth Lee lowered the firm’s price target on Invesco (IVZ) to $33 from $35 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares after its Q4 earnings beat. The company’s expense outlook is a focus, but the firm believes the overall impact is slight, the analyst tells investors in a research note. RBC adds that it still sees an improved organic growth outlook and potential incremental margin expansion.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing

headline: Gold Tops $5,500 as Record Rally Gains Pace on Debasement Trade
summary: Precious metals have risen dramatically this year on heightened geopolitical tensions and worries about the independence of the Federal Reserve, which have supported the debasement trade.  Gold’s recent surge “reflects a rare alignment of forces rather than a single catalyst,” said Christopher Hamilton, head of client solutions for Asia-Pacific ex-Japan at asset manager Invesco Ltd. “The speed with which gold is breaking milestones underscores how quickly confidence in traditional policy tools is eroding.”  Spot gold has risen by nearly 30% this year and silver by around two-thirds, in a rapid acceleration of multiyear bull runs.
